member.summary: Data sent by server to the client with the resources url for available actions

member.summary: Gets or sets the Resource type (ex : "mapSettings", "view", ...) : which data the resource represents

member.summary: Gets or sets the list of possible to follow resources. Can be null or empty or filled.

member.summary: Gets or sets the list of possible to follow resources. Can be null or empty or filled.

member.summary: Gets or sets the custom properties agreed upon between the server and client, for this resource type

member.name: M:Framework.WebApi.DtoAndContract.Attributes.ColumnDescAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,Framework.WebApi.DtoAndContract.Attributes.ColumnDescType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Options for the SearchableList columns to enable more control on rendering.
member.param: false by default, if true, then sorting on the column will be possible
Default width for the column. If not set, a value will be set by default depending on type and property type.
javascript function to be used for rendering.
Type of rendering. Auto by default. Auto will render depending on property type. Currency will format column depending on
false by default. Set true if you wish to hidde this column.

member.name: F:Framework.WebApi.DtoAndContract.Attributes.ColumnDescType.Auto
member.summary: If this is the specified ColumnDescType, then the column type will be taken depending on the property type For boolean property it will behave as Checkbox For Datetime property, it will behave as Datetime,

member.name: F:Framework.WebApi.DtoAndContract.Attributes.ColumnDescType.Currency
member.summary: Format column following the currency format.

member.summary: Format column with the Fmk_longDate_format

member.summary: Format column with the Fmk_dateTime_format

member.summary: Display a checkbox in the column

member.summary: Gets or sets the full url for the resource

member.summary: Gets or sets the Resource type : what data the resource represents (i.e which contract is necessary to understand it)

member.summary: Gets or sets the REST method available to call the resource (GET, POST, PUT or DELETE)

member.name: P:Framework.WebApi.DtoAndContract.ResourceLink.Label
member.summary: The label to display the link. For example, Method=PUT + ResourceType=Product => Label(fr-FR) = Modifier le produit => Label(en-US) = Update the product

member.name: M:Framework.WebApi.DtoAndContract.ResourceLinkExtensions.ResourceLink(System.Web.Http.Routing.UrlHelper,System.String,System.String,System.Object,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a resourceLink from a route with path substitution via UrlHelper.Route /!\ this method is not safe when you want to use a query (see the ResourceLinkExtensions.ResourceLink method in Framework.WebApi.Core)
member.remarks: This method should be located in Framework.WebApi.Core but as we have to guarantee backward compatiblity, we can not move it now...
